report.title: Max occattr val for parent sample
report.description: Retrives the maximum value of an integer occurrence attribute for samples within a parent sample.
report.query: SELECT max(oav.int_value) as maxval FROM occurrence_attribute_values oav JOIN occurrences o on o.id=oav.occurrence_id and o.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false WHERE s.parent_id=#parent_sample_id#

param.name: parent_sample_id
param.description: Sample ID for the parent sample
